subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Blue Devils Coach Mike Krzyzewski took ill after a team meal and was advised by doctors to sit out a game at Georgia Tech. His up-and-down team responded with a big win.
snippet: Blue Devils Coach Mike Krzyzewski took ill after a team meal and was advised by doctors to sit out a game at Georgia Tech. His up-and-down team responded with a big win.
